Audit.hosts: comma separated list of host urls
Audit.long_desc:
Elastica’s Audit application finds the cloud applications being used in your company and highlights any vulnerabilities, risks and compliance issues related to these applications. The application:

  • Provides a Business Readiness Rating™ for each discovered app based on 60+ metrics
  • Allows you to customize these ratings based on weighting priorities of key criteria
  • Enables simple comparisons to alternative applications for consideration

    • %%%

    Upload Firewall Logs

    Get started by uploading your firewall logs or configure CloudSOC™ as a listener of your firewall logs. CloudSOC™’s Audit application allows you to anonymize any personal information in the logs.

    %%%

    Find Cloud App Usage and Risks

    Instantly find SaaS apps used by your employees along with any risks these apps may pose to your organization. An intuitive Business Readiness Rating™ based on 60+ objective metrics is assigned to each app.

    %%%

    Tailor Ratings to Your Requirements

    Organizations can tailor the rating of cloud applications to match their requirements by adjusting the “weighting” of the evaluation metrics (e.g., two-factor authentication is a “must have”).

    %%%

    Find Alternative Apps

    Readily compare apps side-by-side to find safe alternatives for risky cloud apps rather than resorting to brute force blocking; empowering employees while maintaining corporate standards.
Audit.long_desc1:

Get started by uploading your firewall logs or configure CloudSOC™ as a listener of your firewall logs. CloudSOC™’s Audit application allows you to anonymize any personal information in the logs.

Box.long_desc:
Elastica Securlet™ for Box enables organizations to protect their assets stored in Box.

  • Audit your Box account and find vulnerabilities instantly
  • Detect Threats based on user activity
  • Protect against data loss by enforcing policies and controls
  • Perform targeted Investigations on user activity
    • %%%

    Audit & Remediate Vulnerabilities

    Identify files shared outside the company, and flag sensitive content such as personal identifiable information (PII), payment card information (PCI) and protected health information (PHI).

    • Detect PII, PCI, PHI, source code, financial or other sensitive types of data
    • Initiate alerts to data owners and limit sharing to ensure compliance
    • Remediate individual files or in bulk
      • %%%

      Detect Threats to Box

      Let Elastica’s data science platform continuously monitor user level activity to identify a wide range of threats. Suspicious behavior is automatically assigned a ThreatScore™

      %%%

      Protect Data

      Readily define and enforce granular policies to:

      • Prevent exposures and sharing of sensitive documents
      • Thwart suspicious account behavior
      • Limit access to sensitive documents
      %%%

      Perform Targeted Investigations

      Investigate historical transactions on your Box account using advanced search and filtering capabilities for post-incident analysis.

Elastica Securlet™ for G Suite enables organizations to protect their assets stored in G Suite.

  • Audit your G Suite account and find risks instantly
  • Detect Threats in your G Suite user activity
  • Protect data loss in G Suite by enforcing policies and controls
  • Perform targeted Investigations on user activity
    • %%%

    Audit & Remediate File Sharing Risks

    Identify files shared outside the company, and flag sensitive content such as personal identifiable information (PII), payment card information (PCI) and protected health information (PHI).

    • Detect PII, PCI, PHI, source code, financial or other sensitive types of data
    • Initiate alerts to data owners and limit sharing to ensure compliance
    • Remediate individual files or in bulk
      • %%%

      Detect Threats to G Suite

      Let Elastica’s data science platform continuously monitor user level activity to identify a wide range of threats. Suspicious behavior is automatically assigned a ThreatScore™

      %%%

      Protect Data

      Readily define and enforce granular policies to:

      • Prevent exposures and sharing of sensitive documents
      • Thwart suspicious account behavior
      • Limit access to sensitive documents
      %%%

      Perform Targeted Investigations

      Investigate historical transactions on your G Suite account using advanced search and filtering capabilities for post-incident analysis.

Protect.long_desc:
Elastica’s Protect App lets you define and enforce policies for your cloud services that thwart attacks and ensure corporate governance.

%%%

Unified Policies Reduce Complexity

Define unified policies that span multiple cloud apps, eliminating the complexity and overhead of definition and enforcement on a per app basis.

%%%

Risk-Based Policy Enforcement

Leverage dynamically generated ThreatScoreTMs to trigger policies that alert administrators and/or block transactions before data breaches occur.

%%%

Prevent Data Loss

Enforce intelligent controls to maintain compliance policies surrounding critical data rather than broadly blocking use of file sharing services.

%%%

Real-time enforcement

Real-time detection is coupled with real-time enforcement in the Elastica Gateway. So instead of learning about attacks after the fact - you can prevent them before they occur.
Protect.long_desc1: Elastica’s Protect App lets you define and enforce policies for your cloud services that thwart attacks and ensure corporate governance.
Protect.long_desc2:
Unified Policies Reduce Complexity

Define unified policies that span multiple cloud apps, eliminating the complexity and overhead of definition and enforcement on a per app basis.
Protect.name: Protect
Protect.short_desc: Create intuitive and unified policies to enforce machine-learning assisted controls, simultaneously over multiple cloud services and users.  Analyze policy violations and alerts

RussTest.long_desc:
Elastica Securlet™ for Russ enables organizations to protect their assets stored in Russ.

  • Audit your Russ account and find vulnerabilities instantly
  • Detect Threats based on user activity
  • Protect against data loss by enforcing policies and controls
  • Perform targeted Investigations on user activity
    • %%%

    Audit & Remediate Vulnerabilities

    Identify files shared outside the company, and flag sensitive content such as personal identifiable information (PII), payment card information (PCI) and protected health information (PHI).

    • Detect PII, PCI, PHI, source code, financial or other sensitive types of data
    • Initiate alerts to data owners and limit sharing to ensure compliance
    • Remediate individual files or in bulk
      • %%%

      Detect Threats to Russ

      Let Elastica’s data science platform continuously monitor user level activity to identify a wide range of threats. Suspicious behavior is automatically assigned a ThreatScore™

      %%%

      Protect Data

      Readily define and enforce granular policies to:

      • Prevent exposures and sharing of sensitive documents
      • Thwart suspicious account behavior
      • Limit access to sensitive documents
      %%%

      Perform Targeted Investigations

      Investigate historical transactions on your Dropbox account using advanced search and filtering capabilities for post-incident analysis.
